note.p: Birth: All Hallows in the Wall, London, England, Europe (15 April 1636)
Burial: Hartley Maudit, Hampshire, England, Europe (14 January 1700)
Education: St Paul's School, London; Wadham College, Oxford (BA 1657; DD Lambeth 1674); Inner Temple (admitted 1659)

Career: Inherited Westcote from his uncle Edmund Heighes (1661); ordained (1669); Rector of Shalden, Hampshire (1673-1700); Rector of Hartley Maudit, Hampshire (to 1700); Canon of Chichester (1676); Canon of Winchester (1680-1700)
Other RSActivity: Expelled due to non-payment of arrears.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Foster; Hunter; McDonnell
